==== Seahorse ====

Seahorse is a Key/Password manager.  It is a tool for setting up gnupg (gpg)keys to encrypt your docs, mails and other files.  It also manages ssh keys and passwords and can sync your public keys with on-line servers.

'''Tests to perform'''

** Setup or import a gpg key for your email address.
** Be sure that signing and syncing works.
** Be sure that passwords are not visible.
** Import a friends key and sign it.
